name: Stop Killing Babies
description:
In an alternative dystopian world, technology is at it's peak and government has all control over it. They have researched such a technology that it could change the whole future: a machine that detects criminal behavior of humans at their birth.

You are a government officer that regulates this process: you decide the lives of the newborn and choose whether they live or die. You have to take this job extremely seriously. This is your responsibility for your nation and your people. Make the correct choice, save future lives.
